description: SWF export settings for the application object.

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the SWFExportPreference (a Application).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: Flatten transparency when exporting.
properties.name: flattenTransparency

properties.description: The dynamic media handling options.
properties.name: dynamicMediaHandling

properties.description: The name of the page transition to use for all pages.
properties.name: pageTransitionOverride

properties.description: SWF background setting
properties.name: swfBackground

properties.description: The frame rate in frames per second.
properties.name: frameRate

properties.description: The fitting method to use.
properties.name: fitMethod

properties.description: The options for fitting to predefined dimension.
properties.name: fitOption

properties.description: The size fits to given scale percentage.
properties.name: fitScale

properties.description: The size fits to given width and height.
properties.name: fitWidthAndHeight

properties.description: The pages to print, specified either as an enumeration or a string. To specify a range, separate page numbers in the string with a hyphen (-). To specify separate pages, separate page numbers in the string with a comma (,). Can return: PageRange enumerator or String.
properties.name: pageRange

properties.description: If true, each spread in the exported document is combined into a single page that has spread's original width.
properties.name: dynamicDocumentExportReaderSpreads

properties.description: If true, all the pages in the exported document will be rasterized.
properties.name: rasterizePages

properties.description: Flag indicates whether to generate HTML.
properties.name: generateHTML

properties.description: The text export policy.
properties.name: textExportPolicy

properties.description: Flag indicates whether to include interactive page curl when export to SWF.
properties.name: includeInteractivePageCurl

properties.description: The SWF raster compression options.
properties.name: rasterCompression

properties.description: The JPEG quality options.
properties.name: jpegQualityOptions

properties.description: The SWF curve quality.
properties.name: curveQuality

properties.description: The raster resolution.
properties.name: rasterResolution

properties.description: The resampling type.
properties.name: resamplingType

properties.description: The resampling threshold.
properties.name: resamplingThreshold

properties.description: Flag indicates whether to allow to use network access when export to SWF.
properties.name: useNetworkAccess

properties.description: Flag indicates to whether to view the SWF after exporting.
properties.name: viewSWFAfterExporting

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the SWFExportPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

name: SWFExportPreference
